author: hiranya
msg: Improved and refactored the multi xml config builder/serializer code. THe serializer API was updated by adding a set of new methods to enable serializing of individual configuration elements. The builder now keeps track of the location of the registry definition.
I'm not checking this into the 1.3 branch since it does not contain any critical fixes or improvements from the perspective of the 1.3 release.
